title: The Crypto Conundrum: Bitcoin vs. VC Investments
description: In recent months, the world of cryptocurrency has witnessed a fascinating and somewhat paradoxical trend: while the price of Bitcoin (#BTC) has been on a rollercoaster ride, venture capital (VC) investments in crypto startups have steadily declined, reaching multi-year lows in August. Surprisingly, the correlation between Bitcoin’s performance and VC interest in the crypto space […]
